notices.title: Welcome Note for New Members
notices.summary: Official welcome message and segment overview for new members.
notices.content:
The Dhaka Commerce College Science & IT Club warmly welcomes all newly inducted members.

Club activities for this session will commence soon. All official updates and notices will be shared through **WhatsApp** and **Discord**.

**Available Segments:**
- **Wall Magazine:** Science & technology articles, innovations, and creative STEM content
- **Scrapbook:** Project summaries, research work, and scientific documentation
- **Robotics:** Robot design, development, and competitions
- **Programming:** Coding sessions, problem-solving, and projects

**Discord Server:**
https://discord.gg/GD7Hqv2vn4

We look forward to an engaging and productive session.

**Issued by:**
Saif Islam
General Secretary, DCCSITC
